text:
Hello everyone,
I hope you're doing well. I'm reaching out here because I'm uncertain if this is the appropriate channel for addressing my concern. Is there someone who might be responsible for the github repository "HubSpot-api-python"?

I've gone ahead and submitted a pull request with the intention of incorporating a proxy configuration. This change would allow us to effectively utilize the HubSpot library within the context of our proxy setup. <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-python/pull/229>

Could I kindly ask for assistance in reviewing and potentially accepting my pull request?
Your support and guidance would be greatly appreciated. Thank you in advance!
Best regards, Vera
